title: Opinion: The divide between pro- and anti-vaccine states is widening
description: “Vaccine policy now tracks political identity more closely than epidemiology,” write Richard Hughes IV and Lawrence O. Gostin.
content: “Vaccine policy now tracks political identity more closely than epidemiology,” write Richard Hughes IV and Lawrence O. Gostin.
